page.title: 15Wheatley Hill - My Village
page.content: I live in{Wheatley Hill.}It is a small village in County Durham. There used to be a{coal mine}in the village and most of the men were{miners.}In 1968 the mine closed. The large pulley wheel used to overshadow the village, but now it has gone and there are horses grazing on green fields where it once stood. Now there is a lot of unemployment in the village. Some people have been lucky enough to find work in nearby { {toy or clothing factories}in{Peterlee. There are some new businesses in the village but not many new buildings. Old buildings are changed not pulled down. The Anorak Factory was once the chapel, a large D.I.Y store was a cinema, a Sportswear factory was the dance hall. The old secondary school is now factory units.
